resources.string: Could not open the app. It is not installed or not allowed to run. Please refresh or restart if it continues to happen.
Could not open setting. Please refresh/restart it if you keep experiencing this error.
Something is not right. Please refresh.
A component will be restored only if it is available in the backup package.
Alpha Backup Pro is a fully featured Android app that lets you to backup, share and manage apps and app data of your Android device - and a lot more!

The app introduces a new file type with the extension .sapk which is the equivalent of an apk file, but contains multiple split components of an app. Files of this type are supported only by this app and can only be generated with this app. Files with this extension that are not generated by this app will be considered as corrupted or damaged file. You can backup, restore or share any App Bundle / Split APK package with the app and it can be installed later with this app.

"Please note that some apps can't be installed on some devices and some devices will not be able to run some apps as expected, or will not be able to run them at all. Particularly, App Bundle or Split APK packages may not be installed on another device. These situations are applicable for both traditional APK and the new Split APK or App Bundles and may occur because of the limitations of your device's Operating System(OS) and hardware. This app has no control or authority to overcome these issues. These are the concerns of device manufacturers and core Android System developers."
"If you have any suggestion, feature request, problem or anything you want to know, please let us know. We'll be glad to hear from you."
"A million thanks to these people. It wouldn't have been possible without them."
Thanks a lot for installing this app

To be honest, this app does not require the %s permission to perform its operations, because it can use the current Android standard, %s. However, as of now, %s is extremely slow compared to the classic File APIs, but may get faster with time.
So, granting %s permission will result in significantly better performance.
To schedule auto backups, we require permission to set alarm tasks.
%s permission allows an app to access, modify, or remove any file or folder residing inside any connected storage device.
To let us install or restore app backups, allow us as a trusted installation source.

Specifies the method to use for auto backup of app installers. Auto backup can either be scheduled or it can run in background. In case of background auto backup system, a notification will be present all the time to capture any newly installed/updated app installers. The background auto backup system may consume much more power than scheduled auto backup system.
Traditional APK file. May not install.
Indicator of where the backup file is stored.
Type of the installer. That is, whether the installer is an apk file or a sapk file generated from split apks.
Name or label of the corresponding app.
Package name of the corresponding app.
Version name (Version code) ∙ compatible OS range of the installer (if installer available).
Size of the backup file, time of backup.
Whether the corresponding app is installed.
Whether auto backup is scheduled for the corresponding app.
App data is corrupted. Uninstall, and then reinstall the app to fix the issue.
App installers will be backed up right after they are installed.
The app may restart after this operation.
App needs to be installed in order to restore its data.

There is already a newer version of this app installed on this device. You cannot install old version on top of new one. If you want to do so, please uninstall the new version and then install the old one.
"As a non-root user, you can't uninstall it."
"As a non-root user, you can't uninstall it completely, but you can just uninstall the update."
Informs user about the renewal operation of auto backup configurations.
Auto backup system will backup a call log only if the corresponding contact is known.
Auto backup system will backup a call log only if the corresponding contact is not known.
Auto backup system will backup a message only if the corresponding contact is known.
Auto backup system will backup a message only if the corresponding contact is not known.
Auto backup system will backup all the installed apps on this device.
Auto backup system will backup all the available call logs.
Auto backup system will backup all the available contacts.
Auto backup system will backup all the available messages.
Auto backup system will only backup call logs for the selected contacts.
Auto backup system will backup contacts only from the selected accounts.
Auto backup system will only backup message sent to or received from the selected contacts.
Auto backup system will backup only the selected apps.
Could not create backup directory. App may misbehave.
We recommend that you should create a new folder with your desired name and set it as the backup location. Also, try not to put other files or folders inside the backup location.
Restore failed for some or all of the selected packages.
Do not clear cached backups if any cloud backup or share is running.
Cannot use this folder as backup location. Please select another one.
Click %s to go to the Crowdin translation project or go to %s from any internet browser.
Check for update / Open in Google Play
Notification regarding the auto(scheduled) backup process of complete-data bundles.
Components will be backed up periodically at a given time.
Stronger compression will result in longer backup and restore time.
Could not access the selected folder. If you encounter this issue, please move the backup files to another location and retry.
Could not access the selected zip file. If you encounter this issue, please move the zip file to another location and retry.

Restoration of some backups may fail if it does not contain a particular component.

For example, trying to choose the option to restore both app and data for a backup that does not contain the installer will fail because data cannot be restored without the app being installed. There can be other cases too where the restoration may fail.
Select additional data types to backup
Make sure that the security PIN is enabled and it is the same as it was when the encrypted backup(s) was created.
Settings related to manual and auto backup.
Settings related to restoration of backups.
Your device may reboot after the operation.
Your device will reboot after the operation.
Disabling PIN will also disable all encryption features. You will not be able to restore or decrypt any encrypted data or files.
Current PIN is used as the key of encryption and decryption. Data or files encrypted with a particular key can only be restored or decrypted with that key itself, no other key will work.
Notification regarding the auto(scheduled) backup process of external-data bundles.
Files or data encrypted with current PIN cannot be restored or decrypted with another PIN.
Do this only if you are sure that no apps are being shared or backed up on cloud storage, otherwise those processes will be interrupted.
Tap on a list item to get a wide range of options such as backup, restore, share, and a lot more.
Long tap on a list item to start multiple selection. After your selection is complete, perform your desired batch operation from the options available at the top of the screen.
Custom file-type created by Buggysofts to support installation of multi-part Android app, generated from new App Bundle installation package format.

App specific data located in public storage spaces of Android devices, that is, shared internal storage, removable storage devices etc.

Normally, these are the app specific data inside Android folder, found on root of storage devices.

Many apps and games store large temporary data as external data.

App data located in app specific private storage spaces of Android devices. These are secure storage locations and cannot be accessed without root access.

Internal data contains app configuration data, databases and other important data needed to run an app.

"Google has launched a new type of app package called App Bundle which generates multiple source files after installation. Although the source files include the base apk file, in most cases that apk is not complete and generates error while installing. This is why we had to create a new installer file-type(sapk), that can install such an app successfully.

This file-type is only supported by Alpha Backup Pro. So, it is strongly recommended to install Alpha Backup Pro at first. That way, all the backups generated by it will be supported beforehand.


By the way, you can share this kind of app's installers as zip package for compatibility with other apps."

If you need help with something that is not described here, contact us at support@buggysofts.com and we will reply instantly unless we all are dead or sleeping 😁.

There is also a built-in option to contact us.
Swipe down from the top of a list to refresh the data of the list. This can be a list of apps, backups, or any other information.

You have the freedom to use the internal storage or any type of external storage device you can plug in as a backup location. Also, import your backups from any type of storage device you can plug in, including the internal storage.

Apps installed from standard APK files will also be shared as APK files. But, in case of apps that are installed from new app bundle packages, you can share their installers as standard APK, or as SAPK, or as ZIP files.
Know the meaning of the symbols
Contents(Apps/Backups) are installed/stored inside device storage.
This app is not installed. One or more backups are available in the current backup folder.
Contents(Apps/Backups) are installed/stored on the SD Card.
Apps with this icon are installed on the system partition. These apps are known as system apps and are essential for your device. Try not to mess with these.
Archived Tab icon. Selecting this tab shows you all the available backups inside the current backup location.
Updated system apps. Uninstalling these apps will revert back the pre-installed ones.
This version is not installed, one of other versions is installed.
Contains Split-APK or App Bundle package. Backup of this kind of apps will produce files with .sapk extension which can be restored only by this app.
"Newer version is installed but not backed up. Consider backing it up."
"Newer version is available as backup. Consider installing it."
This feature is not available in free version.
If you have any problem with the purchase, please contact us by tapping the button below.
"If you don't see a device listed …"

"It seems that you are using the app illegally. Please know that this is a paid app and we cannot let you use it.
If this is a mistake, please contacts us."
This will stop the import process.

The selected folder is the current backup location.

It is not required or valid to select this folder as an import source, because ultimately we are going to copy or move the backups from other locations to this location. If all of your backups are inside this folder, then you do not need to import anything.

If you need additional help to import your backups, contact us at support@buggysofts.com.
Please install the app first or select a suitable option.
Specifies the storage location where apps should be installed. The system may ignore this setting.
Installable by system and Alpha Backup Pro.
Some modified android OS restricts installation of apps from third party apps in a non-standard way. This may cause failure to install or restore backups on some devices.
Please disable OS optimisation feature in %s to fix this problem.
In particular OS like %s, it is shown as %s. In Other operating systems, this may be different.
If %s is not visible, please follow the instructions for your particular device on how to activate %s.
These settings are also applicable for app installation during data restore.
Indicator of where the app is installed.
Type of the installer. That is, whether the installer is an apk file or a sapk file generated from split apks.
Name or label of the app.
Version name (Version code) ∙ compatible OS range.
Size of installer, time of installation/last-update, availability and status of its backups.
Whether auto backup is scheduled for this app.
Whether it is an updated system app.
Please help us grow by translating the app to your own language. You can also improve the existing translations.
Settings related to auto backup of installers and app data.
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
This number of latest backups will be there in the backup folder, older versions will be deleted automatically.
This number of latest data backups (of individual apps) will be there in the backup folder, older versions will be deleted automatically.
This number of latest installer backups (of individual apps) will be there in the backup folder, older versions will be deleted automatically.
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
Required permissions are not granted. You need to grant these permission requests to be able to use this app.
Required permissions are not granted. You need to grant these permission requests to be able to use this feature.
You need to select at least one option.
There is no accounts set up on your device. Please add one or more accounts to continue.
The backup file you selected is no longer supported.
The directory you selected is not the root of the SD Card
Informs user about an ongoing installer backup. This can generate from the post-install installer backup service, and also from other installer backup services.
Only installable by Alpha Backup Pro
Disabling/Enabling OS optimization feature may clear data of user installed apps.
Time of backup, and other metadata.
To backup and restore call logs.
To show contact details of available call log entries.
To show contact details of available messages.
To show notifications about various tasks.
Permission granted. Now you can enable auto backup.
Informs user about the active post-install installer backup service. This notification will always be present as long the post-install installer backup feature is active.

If you are updating the app and already have backups in a folder, and you want to continue using that folder as the backup location, please select that folder one more time. Make sure you select the root of the backup location, not the sub-folders.
If you want to select a different backup location and want to move your old backups to the new location, please use the import feature to do it the right way.

When you select a backup location, the app automatically creates sub-folders to store different kinds of backups, for example, the folder apk is for storing installers, contacts for contact backups etc. Complete list of sub-folders is given bellow.
If it does not help, please contact us at %s.
We are having problem verifying your license. Please try again later with an active internet connection.
Rate, comment and update Alpha Backup Pro.
"If you like the app, please rate us 5 stars. This is the first and last time we will ever want this from you. If you don't want, we still love you and value your opinions."
Please set the original SMS app as the default SMS app. Otherwise you will not be able to send or receive messages.
Please restore one type of backup at a time (Installer or External Data or Complete Data)
Restored apps may not work until reboot.
Guaranteed to work on this device under current configuration. Only Installable by Alpha Backup Pro.
Notification regarding the scheduled auto backup service.
SD card is not available. Make sure it is inserted and mounted.
Select Additional Data Types to Restore
Please select a folder where you want to store your backups.
All the files and folders inside the added folders will be included automatically.
Import backups from zip files. Encrypted or password protected zip files are not supported.
Your selection includes one or more Split-APK packages. Backup/Share them as -
Your selection includes some updated system apps.

"In order to restore the backups, you need to set %s as the default SMS app until you are done with the restoration.
After you are done restoring, we will ask you again to change it to the original SMS app."
Settings exported successfully at the selected location.
This operation will terminate the app, along with all the background operations - if any.

Restoring settings backed up from another device, or another operating system, or another android version may make your device unusable and your device may not start after reboot. If you are not sure what you are doing, please cancel this operation right now.
In order to backup data from the SD Card, please show us the path to the root of the SD Card.
" Informs user about the startup initialization process."
Make sure your desired storage device is inserted and mounted. To locate a particular storage location or device, open the side navigation menu by tapping ☰.
If the desired storage location or device is not visible within the side navigation menu, tap ⋮ and then tap on Show<Device-Name> to make it appear within the side navigation menu.

Backups that are uploaded to cloud storage, or transferred to any other storage device or folder will not be listed in this app. To add these backups to the database of this app, please download or transfer them to any local storage device, connect it to this device if necessary, and use the import feature to copy/move them to the current backup location.

Clearing /cache partition may interrupt downloads from Google Play Store. It may also interrupt system initiated app backup process. If any of these two processes is running, it is not recommended to check this option.
"This may interrupt downloads from Google Play Store. If the process is running, ticking this option isn't recommended."
Clearing dalvik cache may slow up your device until next boot-up.
It is an updated system app.
This PIN will be used as the key for encryption and decryption.
This will stop the cache wipe process.
This will remove leftover data of apps that are no longer installed on this device.
This will uninstall updates of all the system apps.
You can either uninstall the updates or you can uninstall them completely.
Note that uninstalling system apps may left your device unusable.
Uninstalling updates of the system apps will remove those updates from all the users.
If you have purchased the app and still getting this error, please contact support at support@buggysofts.com.
It will be automatically closed when the backup is complete.
It will be automatically closed when the operation is complete.
We will not show this dialog again, but you can open this dialog from the main settings page and also from the side navigation menu.
You have some temporary cache data generated by this app. Do you want to wipe them before you exit ?
Your all in one app & backup manager
